it.unipd.dei.db.Utils

Class Lemmatizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unipd.dei.db.Utils.Lemmatizer

  • public class Lemmatizer
extends java.lang.Object
    Collection of functions that allow to transform texts to sequence of lemmas using lemmatization

    • Field Detail

      • symbols

        public static java.util.regex.Pattern symbols
        Some symbols are interpreted as tokens. This regex allows us to exclude them.

      • webAddr

        public static java.util.regex.Pattern webAddr
        Web addresses are interpeted as token. We need to exclude them.

      • ref

        public static java.util.regex.Pattern ref
        References to other user are interpeted as token. We need to exclude them.

      • lemmatize

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> lemmatize(java.lang.String doc)
        Transform a single document in the sequence of its lemmas.
        Parameters:
        doc - input document seen as an object of the String class
        Returns:
        ArrayList sequence of lemmas in which the input document has been divided

      • lemmatize

        public static org.apache.spark.api.java.JavaRDD<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>> lemmatize(org.apache.spark.api.java.JavaRDD<java.lang.String> docs)
        Transform an RDD of strings in the corresponding RDD of lemma sequences, with one sequence for each original document
        Parameters:
        docs - javaRDD of documents seen as objects of the String class
        Returns:
        JavaRDD> containing lemmas associated at each input document

      • lemmatize2

        public static java.util.List<java.util.List<edu.stanford.nlp.ling.Word>> lemmatize2(java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.String> itString)
        Break the tweet String into words and save each tweet as a List; save all the tweets as a List of Lists
        Parameters:
        itString - list of the input tweets
        Returns:
        List> list of all the input tweets each of them seen as a list of words
